/index.html.content:
I’m a web developer from Scotland who works with the wonderful people at Alienation Digital making a difference for our clients.

My name is Darren Huskie. I'm 26 years young, hailing from sunny Scotland. I work for Alienation Digital in Glasgow.

I breathe HTML5, CSS3, jQuery, WordPress and responsive design and I'm well versed in PHP, MySQL and SASS.

I'm currently accepting freelance work. If you have a great project you think we'd work well together on why not say hello?
/index.html.title: Darren Huskie
